name: DealerBahn
tag_list: loans, leases, loan, lease, fmv, equipment, commercial-lending, commerical-distribution, software-as-a-sertvice, supply-chain, financial-services
overview:
DealerBahn is an online commercial credit application network, offering franchised commercial equipment dealers access to a diverse group of commercial equipment lenders and product vendors.

Business Model: Credit application services are very low cost to dealers. Revenues derived from access, application and success fees charges to dealers, banks and vendors. Web-based application delivered via Software as a Service from SAS 70 Type II data centers.

Target Markets: -Franchised distributors of commercial equipment in the U.S. (verticals included office technology, health care, construction, materials handling and transportation markets) -Banks and independent financial services firms who specialize in commercial equipment finance -Vendors providing services in / around commercial equipment transaction space. (Insurance, extended warranty, appraisals, auctions, UCC filing, credit reporting entities….)

Corporate Structure: Texas LLC
